name: Gameplay Prototype
description:
Description

A game built using Unity Engine with a focus on gameplay. You play as a prototype character that is free to explore an environment. You are able to test different gameplay features that are commonly used in modern 3D platformers.

Controls

You will need a PlayStation 4 gamepad to play this prototype game. 

X - Jump 

O - Attack 

△ - Equipped / Unequipped Weapon

□ - Interact

RS - Camera Control 

LS  - Movement

Options - Restart Level
